Name: Fury of the Elements
Text: Fury of the Elements deals 3 damage to any target. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Fury of the Elements deals 5 damage to that permanent or player instead.
Flavor Text: "The power of the elements is at our fingertips, waiting to be unleashed."

name: Celestial Blessing
text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 2 life. Creatures you control have lifelink.

Name: Thundering Bolt
Text: Thundering Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Flavor Text: "The sound of thunder follows the flash of lightning. Beware the bolt."

Name: Thundering Bolt
Text: Thundering Bolt deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that permanent is a creature, Thundering Bolt deals damage equal to its power to its controller.
